chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
The battery is faulty, the battery health is at 84%, instead of the 100% indicated, which I have been able to verify using the 3uTools program. It appears that the battery chip is reset and does not meet the minimum 85% guarantee that BackMarket ensures with all its devices. Therefore, I want a refund.

Thank you,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 working days (5 working days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 working days to make a refund if necessary.
The customer must meet the following requirements for the return to be processed:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Confirms that they have deleted their personal data
✔ Have confirmed that they have the return label.
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase proof must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Remember: once delivered, the seller has 3 days (5 days for laptops and household appliances) to repair or replace the article and 2 days to make a refund if necessary.

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
YL
